article.Heading: GST rate list: Here are the new rates of goods that will become cheaper from today
article.Summary: The new tax rates of various goods under the national goods and service tax (GST) will be applicable on goods starting today.
article.Body:
Moneycontrol News

The new tax rates of various goods under the national goods and service tax (GST) will be applicable on goods starting today.

The rates for all the goods are fixed under the four major slabs of 5 percent, 12 percent, 18 percent and 28 percent. Many essential items are exempted from the tax base completely.

Many goods are likely to become cheaper from today. Here's the list of common goods that will cost you less:

[gallery size="large" ids="2304283,2304285,2304287,2304289,2304377,2304293,2304295,2304297,2304375,2304373,2304299,2304301,2304281,2304279"]
